title: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is a name and principal place of business present, to the level of detail required?

citations.text: name and principal place of business
exempt from declaring name and principal place of business

path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if not, is the product exempt from declaring name and principal place of business ?

citations.text: exempt from declaring name and principal place of business

path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is a "packaged on" date required? (durable life of 90 days or less and packaged where sold at retail, unless the food is exempt from a "packaged on" date )
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if so, is it present?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the correct wording "packaged on" / " empaqueté le " used (or in one language if exempt from bilingual labelling)?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the wording grouped with the date or does it clearly explain the date if located elsewhere on the label?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the presentation correct as described above?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is location of the date acceptable as described above?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is an "expiration date " required? (food for special dietary use and infant formula foods)
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if so, is it present?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the location of the date acceptable (anywhere on the label, including the bottom if a reference is made elsewhere on the label indicating the date is present on the bottom)?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the NFt:
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: on the outer package? (except for alternate methods of presentation)
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: not destroyed when product is opened? (except for single-serving containers)
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: on one continuous surface of the ADS?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: placed so that product will not leak or be damaged in order to view the NFt?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the serving size aligned with the regulated reference amount (RA)? Is it expressed using a household measure (HM) first, followed by the corresponding metric measure (MM) in parentheses, based on the food as sold?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if single-serving container, does the package contains less than 200% of the RA for that food, or can the quantity of food in the package be reasonably eaten by one person at a single eating occasion?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: are energy and the 12 core nutrients declared, unless conditions for use of simplified format and single-serving simplified format have been satisfied? ( Note: Small packages with ADS of less than 100 cm 2 that have lost their NFt exemption are only required to declare certain nutrients).
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: are any non-permitted nutrients declared?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: are triggered nutrients declared?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: have the correct units and % DV (percent Daily Value) been used, when permitted/required?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: have amounts (absolute amounts and % DV) been rounded as per the rounding rules set out in the Regulations?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the % Daily Value interpretative statement included in the NFt (when required in the applicable NFt figure used)?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is an FOP nutrition symbol present?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if not, is the product prohibited or exempt from displaying a nutrition symbol?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if not, are the amounts of saturated fat, sugars and/or sodium in the product less than the specified nutrient thresholds ?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: does the nutrition symbol meet the requirements for legibility, language and orientation? Refer to section 6.2 of the Front-of-package nutrition symbol labelling guide for industry .

citations.text: Front-of-package nutrition symbol labelling guide for industry

path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: does the nutrition symbol meet the required technical specifications?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: Refer to Nutrition labelling – Directory of nutrition symbol specifications .

citations.text: Nutrition labelling – Directory of nutrition symbol specifications

path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the nutrition symbol proportional to the PDS?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if not, does the product have a PDS > 250 cm 2 and is only sold in the retail establishment where it is packaged and labelled by means of a sticker?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the product an assortment or a multi-pack where one or more of the foods require a nutrition symbol?

citations.text: Front-of-package nutrition symbol labelling guide for industry

path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if so, is the nutrition symbol applied as directed in section 7 of the Front-of-package nutrition symbol labelling guide for industry ?

citations.text: Front-of-package nutrition symbol labelling guide for industry

path: Name and principal place of business

subsections.title: Imported product

rules.text: Canadian name and principal place of business, grouped with the geographic origin, or preceded by the expressions "Imported by / importé par " or "Imported for / importé pour "?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: or, foreign name and principal place of business is identified?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the information on any label panel except solely on the bottom (except ornamental containers)?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: are type height requirements of 1.6 mm (1/16 inch) or greater are met?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: or, if the area of the principal display surface (PDS) is 10 cm 2 (1.55 inches 2 ) or less, is the minimum type height 0.8 mm (1/32 inch)?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is it in English or French?
path: Name and principal place of business
Name and principal place of business

subsections.title: "Best before" date

rules.text: is a "best before" date required? (durable life of 90 days or less, unless the food is exempt from a "best before" date or is packaged where sold at retail)
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if so, is it present?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the correct wording "best before" / " meilleur avant " used in English and French (or in one language if exempt from bilingual labelling)?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the wording grouped with the date or does it clearly explain the date if located elsewhere on the label?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the presentation of the date acceptable (order of info (year, month, day), use of bilingual symbols for months)? - For example, MA 26.
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the location of the date acceptable (anywhere on the label, including the bottom if a reference is made elsewhere on the label indicating the date is present on the bottom)?
path: Name and principal place of business
Name and principal place of business

subsections.title: Storage instructions

rules.text: are storage instructions required? (required if storage conditions differ from normal room temperature)
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if so, are they present and complete?
path: Name and principal place of business
Name and principal place of business

subsections.title: Legibility and availability

rules.text: is all of the above information readily discernible?
path: Name and principal place of business
Name and principal place of business

subsections.title: Nutrition Facts table (NFt)

rules.text: is an NFt present?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if not, is the product prohibited from using a NFt or exempt from NFt ? (or has an NFt been triggered?)
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if not, does the label have an available display surface (ADS) of less than 15 cm 2 , therefore being exempt from the need to carry an NFt?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if not, does the product qualify for the small package (ADS of less than 100 cm 2 ) exemption? (postal address or toll-free number)
path: Name and principal place of business
Name and principal place of business

subsections.title: Format

rules.text: is the appropriate format family used?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: standard format: all foods and certain assortments
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: simplified format: 6 or more of calories and core nutrients = 0
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: simplified format - single-serving prepackaged products
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: dual format: foods requiring preparation/different amounts
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: aggregate format: different kinds/different amounts
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: infants 6 months of age or older but less than 1 year of age
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is an appropriate format version (size) chosen within a "family" of formats?
path: Name and principal place of business
Name and principal place of business

subsections.title: Graphical and technical requirements

rules.text: colour: is the table background and print in the appropriate colours?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the font and type:
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: sans serif?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: regular or bold as required?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: upper case / lower case as required?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: with no crowding of characters?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is the information in the correct order?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: are the correct indenting and leading used?
path: Name and principal place of business
Name and principal place of business

subsections.title: Location

rules.text: is the nutrition symbol located on the PDP of the product?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: if not:
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is it a scale-labelled product where the nutrition symbol is permitted on the PDS?
path: Name and principal place of business

rules.text: is it an ornamental container where the nutrition symbol is permitted on the bottom of the container?
path: Name and principal place of business
